alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 11:38PM EST until further notice by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. For the Suncook River...including North Chichester...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs at about 20 camp sites at the Lazy River Campground. Flooding also begins at the Epsom Valley Campground. At 10.0 feet, The lower section of the Lazy River Campground floods. Two campsites at the Epsom Valley Campground flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to crest of 11.6 feet late tonight and fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
